Wheat.growing_conditions: Well-drained loamy soil with pH 6.5-7.5, requires moderate water
Wheat.fertilizer_requirements: 120-150 kg N, 60-80 kg P, 40-60 kg K per hectare

Rice.growing_conditions: Clay loam soil with pH 5.5-7.0, requires standing water
Rice.fertilizer_requirements: 100-120 kg N, 50-60 kg P, 50-60 kg K per hectare
Rice.common_diseases: Blast, bacterial leaf blight, sheath blight

Maize.growing_conditions: Well-drained loamy soil with pH 6.0-7.0, moderate water requirement
Maize.fertilizer_requirements: 120-150 kg N, 60-80 kg P, 60-80 kg K per hectare

Cotton.growing_conditions: Well-drained black soil with pH 6.0-8.0, deep soils preferred
Cotton.fertilizer_requirements: 100-120 kg N, 50-60 kg P, 50-60 kg K per hectare
Cotton.common_diseases: Bollworm, white fly, leaf curl virus

Gram.growing_conditions: Well-drained loamy soil with pH 6.0-7.5, low water requirement
Gram.fertilizer_requirements: 20-30 kg N, 40-60 kg P, 20-30 kg K per hectare

Groundnut.growing_conditions: Well-drained sandy loam soil with pH 6.0-6.5, moderate water
Groundnut.fertilizer_requirements: 20-30 kg N, 40-60 kg P, 30-40 kg K per hectare

Soybean.growing_conditions: Well-drained loamy soil with pH 6.5-7.0, moderate water requirement
Soybean.fertilizer_requirements: 20-30 kg N, 60-80 kg P, 30-40 kg K per hectare
